Detailed Description

the VTrie version of the Synonym Dictionary

The class keep the relation between the synonym and macthed synonym lists. VTrie is used to hold the all the synonyms, and a extra array to hold all the synonym entry lists.

Author:
Vernkin

VSynonymContainer::VSynonymContainer ( string  nameFile,
const char *  sep_synonyms = ",",
const char *  sep_words = "_" 
) [inline]

Create the PHSynonymCntainer with specific synonym and word delimiter, and the resource file

Parameters:
nameFile specific synonym resource file, each line is a synonym, each synonym is separated by sep_synonyms in a synonym, and each individal word is separated by sep_synonyms in a synonym entry.
sep_synonyms synonym entry delimiter in a synonym
sep_words word delimiter in a synonym entry

References loadSynonyms(), setSynonymDelimiter(), and setWordDelimiter().
